titleStmt.title: A brief (yet full) account of the doctrine of vulgar and decimal fractions, with a specimen on their demonstrations by William Alingham, teacher of the mathematicks.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed; sold by Mr. Mount at the Postern on Tower-hill, Mr. Lea, Globemaker in Cheapside. Mr. Worgan, Mathematick-Instrument-maker, under St. Dunstan's Church in Fleetstreet; and by the Author, at his House in Channel-Row, Westminster.

notesStmt.note: Includes preface by the author on [4]-[5].
Reproduction of original in: Universität Göttingen Bibliothek.

place.placeName: Mathematick-Instrument-maker, under St. Dunstan's Church in Fleetstreet;
